frameDefinitions: An Agent wants to achieve a Goal,  or an object.
A Term is the linguistic sign conventionally used by a Speaker to refer to a type of Entity.
In this frame a Container holds within its physical boundaries the Contents.
A linguistic Form has a particular Meaning, possibly restricted to a particular Context.
These are words relating to emptying containers and clearing areas of some substance or items.
A Speaker communicates a message stating an Item's membership in a Category, i.e., asserts that the Item has the defining characteristics of the Category.
frameExamples: The modest American <t>goal</t> of a threefold increase in capacity recognises this fact .
Perianth is a collective <t>term</t> for the outer whorls of the flower, which protect the reproductive parts during development.
'Unicorn' <t>denotes</t> a mythological horse with a horn on its head.
The players <t>emptied</t> the bucket over his head.
He <t>depicted</t> his involvement as merely peripheral.
listRoleDefinitions: The volitional actor who intends to achieve a goal.
The action or state of affairs that the Agent wants to achieve.
A <fen>Means</fen> is an object or action that is used or designed to achieve a particular <fen>Goal</fen>.
This role marks expressions that indicate an <fen>Attribute</fen> for which it is the <fen>Agent</fen>'s goal that it have or reach a particular <fen>Value</fen> .
This role marks expressions that indicate which <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Agent</fen> wants the <fen>Attribute</fen> to reach.
This Frame Element expresses a time period during which an <fen>Agent</fen> had a particular <fen>Goal</fen>.
The linguistic sign that is used for referring to a type of <fen>Entity</fen>.
The type of <fen>Entity</fen> that is conventionally referred to by a <fen>Term</fen>.
The <fen>Container</fen> is the physical object which holds within its boundaries the <fen>Contents</fen>
The <fen>Contents</fen> is the substance or objects contained within the physical bounds of the <fen>Container</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Container</fen> holds the <fen>Contents</fen>.
<fen>Form</fen> is the formal pole of a linguistic sign.
<fen>Meaning</fen> is the sense of a linguistic <fen>Form</fen>.
<fen>Referent</fen> identifies an object in the real (or a hypothetical) world that a linguistic expression is used to talk about.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the entity that does the emptying.
The <fen>Theme</fen>, when overtly expressed, invariably occurs in a PP Complement headed by 'of'.
The <fen>Source</fen> is the region or container which is emptied of something.  In this frame, the <fen>Source</fen> occurs as an NP Object.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-sentient force which instigates the emptying.
The time at which the emptying takes place.
The location where the emptying takes place.
The individual that communicates the message concerning the <fen>Category</fen> of an <fen>Item</fen>.
The class of entities with characteristics that match those of the <fen>Item</fen> according to the portrayal of the <fen>Speaker</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> portrays as belonging to a <fen>Category</fen>.
The piece of text in which a <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates their categorization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The point in time at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes a characterization of the <fen>Item</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Speaker</fen> characterizes the <fen>Item</fen>
listRoleExamples: <fex>Microsoft 's</fex> goal of delivering a million copies in the first year is trifling compared to the 25 million copies of Windows it has shipped since May 1990.
The company missed its goal <fex>of getting a thousand third-party software packages shipped</fex>.
The goal <fex>of treatment</fex> was to lower diastolic blood pressure below 85 mm  Hg .
We exceeded our <fex>production</fex> target of 2000 units
GM has a production target <fex>of 2,000,000 units</fex>
But the main goal <fex>of the 1990s</fex> could be to transform a big , heavily armed standing army into a more flexible force
The French term for this is <fex>rime pauvre or rime faible</fex>.
Jews are still waiting for the 'annointed one' to come; their word <fex>for this</fex> is Messiah.
<fex>A basic washing</fex> can degrease your workclothes.
The prisoners were deloused <fex>in June and August</fex>.
However, <fex>'A Brief History of Medicine'</fex> characterizes influenza as the most deadly plague, overall.
